name: tm51
effect: Teaches Roost to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Ally Switch to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV: Roost)

flavor_text.black_white: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user teleports using a strange power and switches its place with one of its allies.
